entry.def: In a theatre, backstage refers to the areas behind the stage.

example.ex: He went backstage and asked for her autograph...
example.tran: 他跑到后台向她索要签名。

example.ex: He met Jackson backstage at his concert in Leeds.
example.tran: 他在利兹音乐会的后台见到了杰克逊。

means.word_mean: 1. a stage area out of sight of the audience
1. out of view of the public; behind the scenes;

sentences.sentence: "Working backstage to gain political support for his proposal"
"many private deals were made backstage at the convention"

means.word_mean: 2. in or to a backstage area of a theater;
